articles.description: Hundreds of SRO workers are planning a strike Wednesday, Outside Lands’ weed area Grass Lands announced its return, and Hardly Strictly Bluegrass dropped a preview teasing 10 acts playing the festival this year.
articles.content: Joe Kukura is an SFist staff asst. editor / reporter who has been published in almost every San Francisco publication, including Hoodline, SF Weekly, Thrillist, and Broke Ass Stuart.

articles.author: Jacob Siegal
articles.title: Netflix’s most expensive movie ever is becoming a cinematic universe - BGR
articles.description: Netflix has ordered a sequel and a spin-off of The Gray Man, which is its most expensive original movie of all time.
articles.content: Netflix is going to turn its most expensive movie of all time into a franchise. On Tuesday, the streamer announced that The Gray Man is getting a sequel as well as a new spin-off film. Joe and Anthon… [+2391 chars]

articles.author: Heidi Parker
articles.title: Mira Sorvino's Oscars speech that left her beloved father Paul Sorvino in tears goes viral - Daily Mail
articles.description: Mira Sorvino mentioning her dad Paul during her Oscar acceptance speech for Best Supporting Actress for her turn in the 1995 film Mighty Aphrodite made the rounds on Monday.
articles.content:
Hollywood actor Paul Sorvino died unexpectedly at the age of 83 on Monday after suffering health issues over the past few years.
Soon after word spread that he had passed, a clip of his daughter Mir… [+6562 chars]
